Medium: cotton
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave
description: Man at horse-drawn plough and a woman sowing seeds. Inscription and date in Russian. (Trans: "One must work hard but it is a pleasure to do one's best.") Warps at one end are knotted into a fringe.
